body_html:
@serendipity24 2834 is the duration in milliseconds and im using the same value for the train and freeze.and while putting the value of 1000ms everything working great,change this value generate exception on the freeze

python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/snoredb/
--wanted_words=yes
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001
--train_dir=/notebooks/snoremodel
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/snoremodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20

python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py
--wanted_words=yes
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv.ckpt-100
--output_file=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv_frozen.pb
body_text:
@serendipity24  2834 is the duration in milliseconds and im using the same value for the train and freeze.and while putting the value of 1000ms everything working great,change this value generate exception on the freeze
python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/snoredb/ 
--wanted_words=yes 
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001  
--train_dir=/notebooks/snoremodel 
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/snoremodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20
python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py 
--wanted_words=yes 
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20 
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv.ckpt-100 
--output_file=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv_frozen.pb
body:
@serendipity24  2834 is the duration in milliseconds and im using the same value for the train and freeze.and while putting the value of 1000ms everything working great,change this value generate exception on the freeze 


python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/train.py --data_dir=/notebooks/snoredb/ \
--wanted_words=yes \
--how_many_training_steps=100,100 --learning_rate=0.001,0.0001  \
--train_dir=/notebooks/snoremodel \
--summaries_dir=/notebooks/snoremodellog
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20


python tensorflow/examples/speech_commands/freeze.py \
--wanted_words=yes \
--clip_duration_ms=2834 --sample_rate=16000 --window_size_ms=20 \
--start_checkpoint=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv.ckpt-100 \
--output_file=/notebooks/snoremodel/conv_frozen.pb
